Disputes over China ties sour Taiwan election campaignBitter disputes on how to handle relations with China and avoid conflict are dominating the final stretch of election campaigning in Taiwan, as some polls show a tight race between the main two contenders to be the island's next president. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 06:46:33 GMT WXNDKD7MFVINPMIBZXUEV5I7FQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/disputes-over-china-ties-sour-taiwan-election-campaign-2024-01-02/Reuters世界亚太地区
Somalia's cabinet calls emergency meet on Ethiopia, Somaliland port dealSomalia's cabinet will hold an emergency meeting on Tuesday to discuss a pact Ethiopia signed with the breakaway region of Somaliland, allowing the former to use the Red Sea port of Berbera, the Somali state news agency said. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 06:29:01 GMT T4O2RZGYVNPOXLTXRJMKFG4BDA https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/somalias-cabinet-calls-emergency-meet-ethiopia-somaliland-port-deal-2024-01-02/Reuters世界非洲
Syrian military says Israeli attack on Damascus outskirts caused material damage - SANAA Syrian military statement said an Israeli air strike early on Tuesday that came from the direction of the Golan Heights targeting positions in the outskirts of Damascus caused some material damage, Syrian state news agency (SANA) reported. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 05:20:55 GMT FK2PIA66JBLI7OR3O6PY3EIMWM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/syrian-military-says-israeli-attack-damascus-outskirts-caused-material-damage-2024-01-02/Reuters世界中东
Gunmen open fire on villagers in India's Manipur, 3 killedAt least three people were killed and five seriously injured when gunmen in camouflage fatigues opened fire on villagers in the restive northeastern state of Manipur, officials said, as sporadic violence continued. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 05:06:54 GMT M5PQYHMFIFMKFNCQLOMIXPSJVY https://www.reuters.com/world/india/gunmen-open-fire-villagers-indias-manipur-3-killed-2024-01-02/Reuters世界印度
South Korea's recent history of political violenceSouth Korean opposition Democratic Party leader Lee Jae-myung was stabbed in the neck and rushed to hospital for treatment on Tuesday, months ahead of a national parliamentary election. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 04:44:48 GMT BXR5KXU74BOI5HDVUSB5DXQGMU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-koreas-recent-history-political-violence-2024-01-02/Reuters世界亚太地区
Thailand, China to permanently waive visas for each other's citizens from March - Thai PMThailand and China will permanently waive visa requirements for each other's citizens from March, Thai Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin said on Tuesday. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 04:16:02 GMT CNCHISFHI5P5FNY5PPDSFFGVYI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thailand-china-permanently-waive-visas-each-others-citizens-march-thai-pm-2024-01-02/Reuters世界亚太地区
Philippines hopeful of exiting global money laundering 'grey list'The Philippines is hopeful of being taken off the money laundering 'grey list' of the Financial Action Task Force (FATF) of this year, the country's Anti-Money Laundering Council said on Tuesday. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 03:54:22 GMT NGEVXKZ2AZNCLIN2VP5B7XK2OU https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/philippines-hopeful-exiting-global-money-laundering-grey-list-2024-01-02/Reuters市场亚洲市场
Hong Kong tycoon Lai pleads not guilty in landmark security trialHong Kong tycoon and pro-democracy advocate Jimmy Lai pleaded not guilty on Tuesday in his landmark trial, where he is accused of endangering China's national security, as prosecutors laid out details of what they said was collusion with foreign forces. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 03:52:36 GMT B2HKYXPKQRKVXIYWEEQ5LTZE4U https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/hong-kong-tycoon-jimmy-lai-pleads-not-guilty-national-security-Trial-2024-01-02/Jessie Pang世界亚太地区
China calls on Taiwan's people to promote 'peaceful reunification'The head of China's Taiwan Affairs Office on Tuesday called on Taiwan's people to promote the process of "peaceful reunification", saying it was the common desire of people on both sides of the Taiwan Strait. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 03:25:47 GMT G5RJI3MSHJLIXGHF52TZVBONRM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-calls-taiwans-people-promote-peaceful-reunification-2024-01-02/Reuters世界中国
Russia pounds Ukrainian cities after Putin vows revengeRussia pounded Kyiv and Kharkiv with missiles, Ukrainian officials said, hours after President Vladimir Putin promised to avenge what Moscow said was a Ukrainian attack on Belgorod that killed 24 civilians. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 02:41:22 GMT T26CYFOYZZLMNEFUAEZB3P​​6HLU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-launches-drone-attack-kyiv-ukraine-says-2024-01-02/Pavel Polityuk, Valentyn Ogirenko世界欧洲
South Korea opposition chief stabbed by assailant; motive unknownSouth Korea's opposition Democratic Party leader Lee Jae-myung was stabbed in the neck during a visit to the southern city of Busan on Tuesday and was airlifted to Seoul after receiving emergency treatment, party and emergency officials said. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 01:57:21 GMT L32PYFOLDZIDLADACGXNSZ2YSY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korea-opposition-chief-stabbed-during-visit-busan-yonhap-2024-01-02/Ju-Min Park, Hyonhee Shin世界亚太地区
